programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs show tackling issues behind the headlines from a Scottish perspective

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Lee Mack presents the ultimate leveller of a quiz show where it doesnt matter if youre not usually good at quizzes because the questions are all about logic and common sense.

programme.title: Gallagher PREM Unleashed
programme.desc: Action from the fifth round of fixtures of the 2025-26 Gallagher PREM Rugby season featuring Northampton v Saracens, Exeter v Gloucester, Bath v Bristol, and Leicester v Sale.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: The Jonathan Ross Show: Special Guests
programme.desc: The guests featured with Jonathan in this show include Lady Gaga, Hugh Jackman, Sir Paul McCartney, the Spice Girls, Chris Martin, Gordon Ramsay and Carey Mulligan.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Sharply funny drama. The house sale looms as Shiv prepares to start a new life with Alex, but can she leave her old demons behind and can the family survive without her?

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Join Stephen Mulhern as its Mickelles turn to open the iconic red boxes and take on the Banker while trying to go all the way and win 100,000 pounds.

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Emmy Award winner Maya Rudolph joins Christine as her series Loot returns for a third series, and Dr Hilary shares his advice for a perfect nights sleep.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: Magazine show with celebrity guests, entertainment, advice, competitions and features.

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: Join the Loose Women team as they interview celebrity guests and discuss topical issues.

programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Dickinsons Real Deal
programme.desc: David Dickinson pitches up in Wolverhampton with a team of dealers including Fay Rutter, Mark Stevens, James Layte and Karen Delmaney.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Battling it out are Scouse sisters Brodie and Terrilea, couple Ian and Jacqui from Derbyshire, and mother and daughter Alex and Nicola from Leeds. Hosted by Adil Ray.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Kev takes to the hot seat to face the Banker and opens the renowned red boxes to try to take home 100,000 pounds.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Alan from London, Kathy from Ely, Genevieve from Lincolnshire and Andy from Glasgow work together as a team to face one of the countrys finest quiz brains.

programme.title: STV News at Six
programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Drama on the Yorkshire Dales with one of Britains longest-running and most beloved soaps.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Kevin publicly reveals Carls criminal activities, Hope smashes Jakes phone, Becky spoils Carla and Lisas reunion, and Maggie offers Asha some timely words of advice.

programme.title: The Hack
programme.desc: Dave finds strength from a surprising new ally, and Nick is drawn back into the fight and discovers new information that could change things completely.

programme.desc: The days national and international news with a fresh perspective.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Fighting it out are Lingo-mad mother and daughter Adele and Molly from Manchester, Stoke-on-Trent couple Anita and Alex, and Leeds-based sisters Dominique and Tahiela.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Its Alexis turn in the spotlight - join Stephen Mulhern to find out if she will take home the 100,000-pound jackpot in the show with only one question.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: All that stands between Bernard from Prescot, Lauren from Ipswich, Carina from Wolverhampton, Narinder from Norfolk and thousands of pounds is the small matter of a Chaser.

programme.desc: Jean Johansson goes behind the scenes with charities supported by the STV Childrens Appeal and shines a light on the work changing lives across Scotland.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Mack and Ross bond, Celia is furious, and Jai irritates Laurel.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Eva is pleased to reconnect with Adam, Tim offers Cassie work at Street Cars, Debbie catches Carl and James deep in conversation, and Becky wilfully reawakens old feelings in Lisa.

programme.title: Borderline
programme.desc: Police drama series. Regan and Boyd investigate the murder of a hurling star and uncover a gambling and prostitution ring as a community falls under suspicion.
